entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
